      • Log

        public Log(Log log)
        Create a log similar to an existing log. This constructor is handy when creating... Note: @printStream is initialized to @System.err , not to that of the mainLog
        Parameters:
        log - - existing log

      • Log

      • Log

        public Log(int verbosity)
        Create a log with a given verbosity.
        Parameters:
        verbosity -

      • Log

        public Log(String localName,
           Log mainLog)
        Create a log with a name prefixed with the name of a existing log. This constructor is handy when creating a log for a child process. Note: @printStream is initialized to @System.err , not to that of the mainLog
        Parameters:
        localName -
        mainLog - - existing log ("parent" or main log)
